*** Variables ***
${UTIL_ACTION_DELETE}    PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE
${UTIL_ACTION_CREATE_DIR}    PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_DIR
${ACTION_COPY}    PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.COPY
#--- Promptset PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE --------------
${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#
${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL#
#--- Promptset PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_DIR --------------
${UTIL_PRT_CREATEDIR_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#
#--- Promptset PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.COPY --------------
${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE#
${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET#
${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE}    &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE#
${PROMPTSET_COPY_EXCLUDE}    &UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDE#
${RC_COMMON_ERROR}    101

*** Key Words ***
Clean Up Directory
    [Arguments]    ${directory}
    Init Action    ${UTIL_ACTION_DELETE}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME}    ${directory}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL}    YES
    Action Execute
    Init Action    ${UTIL_ACTION_CREATE_DIR}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_CREATEDIR_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR}    ${directory}
    Action Execute

Clean Up Directory Remote
    [Arguments]    ${directory}    ${agent}    ${login}
    Action Create    ${UTIL_ACTION_DELETE}
    Action Set    ${PRT_AGENT}    ${agent}
    Action Set    ${PRT_LOGIN}    ${login}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME}    ${directory}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_DELETE_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL}    YES
    Action Execute
    Action Create    ${UTIL_ACTION_CREATE_DIR}
    Action Set    ${PRT_AGENT}    ${agent}
    Action Set    ${PRT_LOGIN}    ${login}
    Action Set    ${UTIL_PRT_CREATEDIR_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR}    ${directory}
    Action Execute

Copy Test Data
    [Arguments]    ${sourceFile}    ${target}
    Init Action    ${ACTION_COPY}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE}    ${sourceFile}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET}    ${target}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE}    YES
    #Copy Test Data

Copy Test Data Remote
    [Arguments]    ${sourceFile}    ${target}    ${agent}    ${login}
    Action Create    ${ACTION_COPY}
    Action Set    ${PRT_AGENT}    ${agent}
    Action Set    ${PRT_LOGIN}    ${login}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE}    ${sourceFile}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET}    ${target}
    Action Set    ${PROMPTSET_COPY_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE}    YES

Action Report Should Contain
    [Arguments]    ${text}
    ${report} =    Action Get Report
    Should Contain    ${report}    ${text}

Action Report Should Be Found
    ${report} =    Action Get Report
    Should Not Be Empty    ${report}

Action Report Should Not Be Found
    ${report} =    Action Get Report
    Should Be Empty    ${report}

Action Return Code Should Be
    [Arguments]    ${code}
    ${returnCode}=    Action Get Variable    Return code
    Should Be Equal    ${returnCode}    ${code}

Action Return Code Should Equal
    [Arguments]    ${code}
    ${returnCode}=    Action Get Variable    Return code
    Should Be Equal    ${returnCode}    ${code}

Action Return Code Should Be
    [Arguments]    ${code}
    ${returnCode}=    Action Get Variable    Return code
    Run Keyword If    ${code} == ${RC_COMMON_ERROR}    Should Be True    ${returnCode} >= ${RC_COMMON_ERROR}
    Run Keyword If    ${code} < ${RC_COMMON_ERROR}    Should Be Equal    ${returnCode}    ${code}

Action Return Status Should Be
    [Arguments]    ${status}
    ${returnStatus}=    Action Get Variable    Status
    Should Be Equal    ${returnStatus}    ${status}

Action Return Variable Should Be
    [Arguments]    ${variableValue}
    ${out}=    Action Get Variable    ${variableName}
    Should Be Equal    ${out}    ${variableValue}

Action Return Variable Should Be Equal As Integers
    [Arguments]    ${variableValue}
    ${out}=    Action Get Variable    ${variableName}
    Should Be Equal As Integers    ${out}    ${variableValue}
